content:
{"name": "The Pastor's Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Pastor’s Pantry will provide emergency food to individuals, regardless of age, one time per month. We request individuals visit Davidson County Department of Social Services for a referral form. Bring the referral form from DSS to Pastor’s Pantry to pick-up food 11:00am-3:30pm, Monday-Thursday.
 Proof of income (Social Security 
Statement or Bank Statement)  Health insurance
 Picture ID for all members in the home 
(16 or older)  Life insurance
 Proof you have applied for food stamps 
or FS card  Utilities: Gas/Electric/Oil/Water
 Rent or house payment  Current loan(s)
Home Insurance  Credit card debt
 Car payment  Cable Television/Internet/Phone
 Medication / Medical Bills  Car insurance", "email": "", "url": "https://pastorspantry.org/get-food/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "307 North State Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Lexington", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "27292", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.8271869, "longitude": -80.25169129999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(336) 249-8824", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Copy of photo ID: Medicaid/food stamp or section"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
